Package de.dfki.dmas.owls2wsdl.core Description

Contains core classes to parse service definitions (OWL-S) and referenced datatypes, that are descriped in ontologies (OWL). APIs are the OWL-S API and the JENA 2 Ontology API. The collected information is saved in persitent project files in an API independet XML format using the Castor framework and bean classes.

Related Documentation

For more information see:
  • http://projects.semwebcentral.org/projects/owls2wsdl/
  • http://www-ags.dfki.uni-sb.de/~klusch/i2a/html/software.html
  • http://www.htw-saarland.de/Members/fourman/thesis/

See Also:
